alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 11:46PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lonoke and eastern Pulaski Counties through 1215 AM CST... At 1146 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Little Rock AFB to Argenta to near Shannon Hills. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... Downtown Little Rock... Lonoke... North Little Rock Airport... Little Rock AFB... Ward... Wrightsville... Austin in Lonoke County... Argenta... Old Austin... Parnell... Gravel Ridge... Ironton... Meto... Toltec Mounds State Park... Protho Junction... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
